channel.title: fizzco on Fizz Co.
channel.description: Recent content in fizzco on Fizz Co.

item.title: Welcome to Fizz Co!
item.description: Fizz Co, My first day. After what seems like a lifetime of recruiter calls, failed interviews and several occurrences of wondering if technology really is for me, I’ve finally secured my first developer gig. The company courteous to hire me are called Fizz Co. I couldn’t find much information online about their product, who their customers are or anything really. What I do know is that they’ve been the leader in their industry for the past 10 years but have taken a few hits from an emerging startup - Buzz Cola.
